articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Vivo T3x tipped to launch in late April; Check rumoured features, price, release date and more - HT Tech
articles.description: Vivo T3x, the successor to Vivo T2x, is rumoured to launch in India later this month. From features, and price to release date, know all about the Vivo T3x.
articles.content: Just weeks after the launch of Vivo T3, the company is gearing up to launch another smartphone, the Vivo T3x. Although there is no official information, rumours suggest that the launch of the smartph… [+1613 chars]
